title: Why Netflix canceled your favorite show
description: Netflix was never considered a traditional TV service. Canceling shows that arent performing well is an understood and necessary part of being a TV network, but Netflix has started canceling shows faster than ever before. Whereas older Netflix originals like House of Cards, Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt, Grace and Frankie, and Orange is the New Black were given five or six seasons, beloved newcomers like The OA and Tuca and Bertie dont have the same opportunities. The company is still invested in original series, but expect to see more international shows and titles from big showrunners.
